message:
Code running in a `Task.Run` should be cancelled by [passing it a `CancellationToken` and having the code observe that `CancellationToken`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads) (either by passing it to other methods or by periodically calling `ThrowIfCancellationRequested`).

I'm not talking about passing the `CancellationToken` to `Task.Run` - that does nothing. I'm talking about passing the `CancellationToken` to the code *inside* `Task.Run`.
